author: stsp
msg: Add a new tempfile creation function based on apr_file_mktemp().
(svn_io_file_name_get): Another new wrapper function, for apr_file_name_get().
(svn_io_mktemp): New function for creating temporary files.
This function uses whatever mechanism apr_file_mktemp() uses to create
temporary files. Except for taking one less parameter than
svn_io_open_uniquely_named(), it is source compatible and intended
to be used as a drop-in replacement for situations where
svn_io_open_uniquely_named() is not suitable, e.g. for performance
reasons (see r37972) or if the caller requires non-predictable filenames.

author: stylesen
msg: (commit_add_file): Ensure that a file does not exist in both the working url
(the path within the transaction) and the public url (the path in HEAD),
since we do not have a way to find the deleted items.
